1 ^ Ecče nunc benedíčite Dòminum: 2 ^ In nòctibus extòllite manûs vèstras in sancta
òmnes sèrvi Dòmini: et benedíčite Dòminum. ^ In the nights lift up your hands to the holy places
qŭi fečit čaĕlum et terram. ^ May the Lord out of Sion bless thee
qŭi statis in domu Dòmini: he that made heaven and earth.
